channel.title: Transducer on Guowei Lv

item.title: Understand Clojure Transducers 1
item.description: In this post, we will define what is a transducer. First, let’s take a closer look at map. (map inc [1 2 3]) A straightforward way to explain what has happened is this: Increment each item by one in a list. At first thought, this sounds like one step operation. Now let’s change the requirement a bit. We want to increment each element by one and then sum them together.
